-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | An experimental DSL for testing on top of Hspec
--   
--   <i>Note:</i> This is experimental! If you are looking for a stable
--   solution for testing Haskell code, try Hspec:
--   <a>http://hspec.github.com/</a>
@package hspec-experimental
@version 0.1.0

module Test.Hspec.Experimental
it :: Testable a => String -> a -> Spec
instance Testable Expectation
